name: Calculus I
description: Differential calculus, limits, continuity, derivatives and applications

name: Calculus II
description: Integral calculus, sequences, series, and differential equations

name: Discrete Mathematics
description: Logic, sets, functions, relations, combinatorics, and graph theory

name: Linear Algebra
description: Vector spaces, matrices, eigenvalues, and linear transformations

name: Physics I
description: Mechanics, waves, and thermodynamics with calculus

name: Introduction to Programming
description: Basic programming concepts using Python. Variables, loops, functions, and data structures

name: Programming Fundamentals
description: Object-oriented programming, recursion, and advanced data structures

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs, and algorithm analysis

name: Computer Organization
description: Computer architecture, assembly language, and digital logic

name: Database Systems
description: Database design, SQL, normalization, and transaction processing

name: Operating Systems
description: Process management, memory management, file systems, and concurrency

name: Computer Networks
description: Network protocols, TCP/IP, routing, and network security

name: Software Engineering
description: Software development lifecycle, design patterns, and project management

name: Web Development
description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and full-stack web applications

name: Machine Learning
description: Supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and deep learning

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Search algorithms, knowledge representation, and expert systems

name: Computer Graphics
description: 3D graphics, rendering, animation, and graphics programming

name: Cybersecurity
description: Network security, cryptography, ethical hacking, and security protocols

name: Mobile App Development
description: iOS and Android development, mobile UI/UX, and app deployment

name: Cloud Computing
description: AWS, Azure, containerization, microservices, and distributed systems

name: Game Development
description: Game engines, physics simulation, AI for games, and multiplayer systems

name: Compiler Design
description: Lexical analysis, parsing, code generation, and optimization

name: Advanced Algorithms
description: Dynamic programming, greedy algorithms, network flows, and NP-completeness

name: Distributed Systems
description: Consistency, fault tolerance, distributed consensus, and blockchain

name: High Performance Computing
description: Parallel algorithms, GPU programming, and cluster computing

name: Senior Capstone Project
description: Independent software project demonstrating mastery of computer science concepts

name: Statistics and Probability
description: Descriptive statistics, probability distributions, and hypothesis testing

name: Microeconomics
description: Supply and demand, market structures, and consumer behavior

name: Technical Writing
description: Professional communication, documentation, and presentation skills
